phrases: Would you all be interested in a treasure hunt?
I found this while cleaning out the History Club's storeroom the other day.
After deciphering it, I now believe that the map leads to buried treasure!
Why would something like that be at school?
It was hidden inside an old pot that
a former club member got at a temple a long time ago.
Our club room has all kinds of things, does not it?
Like Haniwa terracotta figures, or cursed Daruma dolls.
This all sounds way too shady.
Then you do not want to come?
Should not you just go with club members?
I guess it will be just you and me, then, Senpai.
What do you mean just the two of you?
Well, you know, because I am in the History Club.
A-And what about the other members?
They said it looked suspicious and did not want to go.
No way are we leaving you two alone!
That guy acts like a saint.
You cannot let your guard down!
As if nothing would happen if you go alone with the girl you are into, right?!
He seems more gentlemanly than you, Nana.
Yeah, it definitely applies to you both.
There is something I have been curious about for awhile.
Why else would he try to spend time alone with her?
But, when we all hang out together,
I do not get that feeling from him at all.
Is not that what he is been aiming for from the start?
He is been competing with us from the beginning and
Why exactly is he doing all this?
Wearing a Tracksuit Because it is a Club Activity
That is what is on the map.
To think there is treasure buried near Mount Fuji!
Come aboard and bring along all your hopes and dreams!
We will go ahead and head down.
everything that we are looking for!
You girls wait outside a bit.
It is hard to get a good foothold here.
It is dark and easy to lose your footing here.
It would have been dangerous with just you and Serinuma.
I am glad you all decided to come.
How do you feel about Serinuma-san?
all like her and that is why we are here.
You feel the same way, right?
I guess Nishina's intuition is not all that great, after all.
Th-That is not what I mean!
I am asking if you like her romantically!
I am asking whether or not you see her as your special person!
Wait, that is the part that floors you?!
I do not really get that kind of thing.
Like, when your heart pounds when you are near her!
Or you do not want to give her up to anyone else!
You were gone so long, we got worried.
Seems like there is no problem, so let us keep moving.
It is pretty big in here.
It is actually pretty scary, huh?
I am asking whether or not you see her as your special person!
Serinuma-san is a dear underclassman, and a sweet girl.
When we are together, it is a whirlwind of fun and excitement.
Is there something on my face?
Water dripped on me or something.
It is okay, I am here with you!
You are the one who took my hand and held me!
We got to get back fast!
Wh-Which path did we come from?
I am so happy you are here!
I wonder if they ran deeper inside.
All right, let us catch up to them!
I am sure they are waiting for us up ahead.
I was locked inside a storehouse in the countryside a long time ago.
It traumatized me, and now I cannot move an inch anywhere pitch black.
Not even the moonlight reached inside...
I could hear cries outside, but could not tell if they were insects or animals.
The sounds of the rustling trees
and the wind howling sounded almost like a human scream.
I am amazed you even entered this cave at all!
Sorry for causing so much trouble.
I can move if there is even just a little light, though.
D-Do you feel a little less anxious like this?
Everyone has something they have trouble with.
If there is something I can do to help, I will gladly do it.
Do you think that might be Igarashi-kun and the gang?
Glad to see you are safe.
Mutsumi-san, we found what you were looking for over there.
What is with this thing so desperately trying to assert its position...
I told you, someone definitely set us up!
It is all way too elaborate.
Who would put in all this effort?
The second generation president of the History Club is you!
But I am already the president.
This was written three years ago.
So, it was supposed to be opened that year?
In other words, it was a prank pulled by the stupid club founder!
What the hell's wrong with him?!
And thus ended the journey to find the great treasure...
I will be your student teacher here.
Afterward, there came a great storm.
Apparently, he teaches second year Japanese History.
It was quite the shock, right?
Mutsumi-senpai, you did not hear anything about him being a student teacher?
My brother lives on his own, and we have not really kept in touch.
Do you guys not get along?
Where the hell did you come from?!
I never thought I would see you here.
I got you, did not I?
I kept quiet about it since I wanted to surprise you!
These brothers have so much body contact!
They helped me look for that hidden treasure the day before yesterday.
The one you set up, Sensei.
I do not know what you are talking about.
The one you made a map for and hid in the clubroom.
You mean that fake map I set up for the current second-years
that I thought would be fun for picking out the next leader
So three years passed before someone fell for it?!
Everyone went because I asked them to come with me.
Thanks for going out of your way for my little brother.
He kind of seems like a good older brother.
So, which of you is Asuma dating?
With a group of such pretty boys and girls, I would want to date all of you!
The majority of us are guys!
Gender's not a big deal at all.
I could sleep with every one of you.
I am not into men, but I fell for you, and you are a man.
That is the gist of it.
Get a hold of yourself, Nana.
He really does seem like your older brother, Mutsumi-senpai.
The student teacher will be observing our class.
I know he is handsome, but please try not to look at him.
And so, Mutsumi-sensei fit into our school without a hitch.
His lessons were interesting and easy to understand.
The girls were first to like him.
And before long, even the boys came to grow fond of him.
In just a matter of days, he became hugely popular!
What a great haul of new releases I got today.
Putting things on hold really is the way to go.
Sensei, what are you doing here?
I was thinking of catching a movie.
I am all done now, so I was thinking of heading home.
How about we grab a light lunch, then?
I bet you did not eat yet.
I have got time until my movie starts.
I ended up going with him.
This place is so fancy that I cannot relax.
So, you are a member of the history club?
Is he doing a good job?
He is always been a bit meek.
He is not terribly assertive, either,
so I was a bit worried about whether or not he would do well.
Um, I think he is doing just fine.
He is always so zoned out.
He is super gullible, so I used to pull pranks on him all the time.
He was so cute when he cried.
L-Like, maybe locking him in a storehouse?
At our grandpa's place in the countryside!
I forgot him there the whole night!
When we went to the cave, he was so panicked that he grabbed on to me.
Oh, sounds like my brother put you through a lot of trouble.
No, that is not what this is about.
It is true that Senpai is not the assertive type,
but he is helped me out in lots of different ways.
And it is like, he is really strong where it matters, and truly kind.
Looks like he is grown up to be quite a guy
to get so much praise from his cute underclassman!
and decided I would drop by for dinner, too.
Today, I was hanging around Shinjuku.
And I met that girl, Serinuma-san?
She was on her own, too, so I had her join me for lunch.
I wish I would had an underclassman that cute!
I wanted to be adored like that!
Been a while since I ate Mom's cooking!
Uh, what is this cardboard box for?
I just had something I wanted to give you.
Is not it from that anime you said you liked yesterday?
The legendary Mirage Saga Local Collaboration prize!
I have never seen it before!
I-I remembered I had it lying around my house after winning it in an arcade.
Y-You are giving it to me?!
But, I cannot take something this amazing!
This is sold at a really high premium!
Do you think it is acceptable for a student teacher to make a move on a student?
Then, once my term is up, I am free to pursue her, right?
You do not have a reason to stop me then, do you?
It is not like you to be late, Shinomiya-kun.
An older lady called out to me on the train.
She said I looked like her grandson and I could not get away.
Speaking of, you get candy a lot, do not you?
Well, I much prefer having to talk to ladies like that than girls my own age.
When it comes to age, I much prefer someone older.
You definitely have that look about you.
Everyone is got a type they are not good with!
I can get a feel for anyone when we meet,
